definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: They presented a prototype device that resembled a tongue depressor .
sentences.chinese: 他們發表一個看起來像壓舌板的原型裝置。

sentences.english: The inner part of the tongue depressor is provided with a lighting device.
sentences.chinese: 其在壓舌板內部有一照明裝置。
